Marksman Putin:
Thank you for your efforts. If you step through the door behind me, you will enter Kamael Village.
The monsters in Mimir's Forest are powerful, aren't they? If you feel that they are easy, it may be time for you to challenge yourself with a trip to Nornil's Cave.
Ask about Nornil's Cave.
